NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
MELORAE: Friends, Coleus and I shall be departing for our joint expedition of the star system's other planets with our reunited friends soon! Please wish us both well!
2
1
COLEUS: I cannot wait, Melorae! Have our friends on <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</color> decided which planet we shall be exploring first?
3 2
MELORAE: They have! We shall be traveling to the stormy planet with them - while another group explores the forested planet.
4
3
COLEUS: You seem particularly pleased about this arrangement, Melorae. I am excited too, of course - but what about this stormy planet brings you such excitement?
5
4
MELORAE: Our friends have reported that the planet's clouds are so immensely thick, we are unable to probe its hidden interior... Doesn't that fill you with intrigue, Coleus?
6
5
COLEUS: It does, a little.. But it fills me with greater terror! We have no way of knowing what awaits us once we penetrate those thick clouds!
7
6
MELORAE: Come now, Coleus.. Look on the sunward side: it also means we will get to explore a planet that is dark, cool and far from the <color=lightblue>sun's</color> dreadful heat!
8
7
COLEUS: Hah, so that was the reason you were so excited!
9
8
COLEUS: Indeed, it shall be a pleasure to depart this scorching planet at last. I eagerly await what knowledge this stormy planet will share with us!
